title: Byte-Cart
description: A full-featured e-commerce site using Next.js and MongoDB. Supports authentication and cart functions. Covers 50% of Amazon's core features, with server-side rendering for performance and SEO.

title: Pick & Go
description: A mini e-commerce app built with the MERN stack. Features user login, product details, cart, order management, and a seller dashboard with MongoDB integration for smooth user experience.

title: ToDo App
description: A task management tool with features like categorization, due dates, and completion tracking. Responsive design ensures usability across devices.

title: Rock Paper Scissor
description: A basic rock paper scissor game developed by using react and tailwindcss with motion-frame.

title: Calculator
description: A basic calculator for arithmetic operations with a responsive UI. Built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for efficient and quick calculations.

title: Tic Tac Toe
description: A 1- or 2-player Tic-Tac-Toe game with a score tracker. Players place 'X' or 'O' on a 3x3 grid. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for an interactive experience.

title: Banking App
description: Simulates basic banking functions like account creation, deposit, withdrawal, balance check, and closure. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, storing data in the browser.
